original_text: But the men would not listen to him. So the man seized his concubine and made her go out to them. And they knew her and abused her all night until the morning. And as the dawn began to break, they let her go.
korean_text: 무리가 듣지 아니하므로 그 사람이 자기 첩을 붙잡아 그들에게 밖으로 끌어내매 그들이 그 여자와 관계하였고 밤새도록 그 여자를 능욕하다가 새벽 미명에 놓은지라

sentences.original_text: But the men would not listen to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 남자들은 그의 말을 듣지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So the man seized his concubine
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 남자는 그의 첩을 붙잡았습니다.

sentences.original_text: and made her go out to them.
and abused her all night until the morning.
And as the dawn began to break,
